name: Cloak of Spiders
data: It decreases the users strength unnoticably.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (little in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration slightly.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It modifies the user's resistance against poison.
